title: Large 1 bdrm Lower Nob Hill
posting_body: ['775 Post St, #309, San Francisco, CA, 94109', '1 Bed - 1 Bath                    $2,500.00/mo$2,500.00/dep', 'OPEN HOUSE Tuesday 5/3 5pm -7pm, Thurs 5/5 5pm-7pm and Saturday 5/7 12-3pm.', 'Dial 004 on entry box to reach leasing agent.', 'Beautiful 1 bdrm in Historic Lower Nob Hill Apartment Building.', 'Newly renovated kitchen and bathroom.', 'Rent Special:  $600 gift card of your choice with 12mo lease.', 'rent includes gas, water and garbage.', 'The Warrington Apartments at 775 Post Street is a beautifully maintained corner building built in 1913 and has an elegant lobby, community courtyard and is conveniently to downtown, restaurants, Union Square shopping, taxis and bus lines.', '775 Post St, San Francisco, CA 94109', 'Rent = $2500/mo', 'Security Deposit = $2500.00', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:1913', 'Sq Footage: 800 sqft.', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms:1 Bath', 'Parking: None', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: $2500', 'Pets Policy: Cats OK', 'Laundry: On site', 'Floor: 6th', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'UNIT FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range/Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable-ready', 'High-speed internet', 'stone countertop', 'High / Vaulted ceiling', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Vintage building', 'Elevator', 'Secured entry', 'Controlled access', 'Security Monitors', 'On-street parking', 'LEASE TERMS/REQUIREMENTS', 'Credit: Good Standing', 'Income: 3x the Rent', 'Application Fee: $25 per applicant', 'Lease Terms: Annual:1 year lease', 'cats welcomed (no deposit required)', 'heat, water and trash included rent.', 'Residents pay electric and cooking gas', 'Contact info:', 'Scott | Warrington Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Lease Terms: \xa0 12 months']
